ngiemboon: Mèŋ n tǒo mbʉ̀a wɔɔn tàʼ lekwò.
en: I came to this dealership once.

ngiemboon: Áa tsɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ tsɔ́ pazáb ntʉ́m na Ssé gwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ lekwoŋ kwoŋ néŋe nzyè.
en: There are times when some Christians are fasting.

ngiemboon: Lekwoŋ nkáb tɛʼ à tè pòŋ.

en: iron pellet-bells in crescent-shaped pods attached to the end of a spear, for dancing
spear with small bell for dancing queens
